function randomNum(minNum, maxNum) {

let fs = require("fs");
let http= require("http");

let serve = http.createServer((_, response) => {
    response.writeHead(200, {
        'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'
    });
    let filesAll = [];
    fs.readFile('./config.json', (err, data) => {
        if (err) throw err;
        let pathfileDir = JSON.parse(data.toString()).fileDirectory;   
        function readFileDir(dir){
            fs.readdir(dir,(err,files) => {
                if(err) throw err;
                files.forEach(item => {
                    if(fs.lstatSync((dir+'/'+item)).isDirectory()){
                        readFileDir((dir+'/'+item));
                    }else{
                        filesAll.push(item);
                    }
                })
            });
        }
        readFileDir(pathfileDir);
        // let data = JSON.stringify({"data": filesAll});
        response.end('');
    })
    
});

let serve = http.createServer((_, response) => {
    response.writeHead(200, {
        'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
        'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'
    });
    let filesAll = [];  
        function readFileDir(dir){
            let filesDir = fs.readdirSync(dir);
            filesDir.forEach(item => {
                if(fs.lstatSync((dir+'/'+item)).isDirectory()){
                    readFileDir((dir+'/'+item));
                }else{
                    filesAll.push(item);
                }
            })
        }
        readFileDir(pathfileDir);
        let fileData = JSON.stringify({"data": filesAll});
        response.end(fileData);
});
serve.listen(port);
console.log('http://127.0.0.1:'+port);

    try {

    } catch (error) {
        reject(error)
    }
}

// 2.thenæ–¹æ³•

// é¦–å…ˆï¼Œthenæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æŒ‚åœ¨PromiseåŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•

// ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°,å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯å‡½æ•°å¿½ç•¥
// ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªPromise
// ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•éœ€è¦å¼‚æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œ
// ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰thenå¯ä»¥è¢«é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰å¦‚æœonResolveæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨PromiseçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºfulFilledåè°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ6ï¼‰å¦‚æœonRejectedæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨PromiseçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºrejectedåè°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ7ï¼‰thenæ²¡æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„thisï¼ˆä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºthenæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æŒ‚åœ¨PromiseåŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼‰
MyPromise.prototype.then = function(onResolve,onRejected){
    if(typeof onResolve !== 'function'){
        return onResolve = value => value
    }
    if(typeof onRejected !== 'function'){
        return onRejected = reason => reason
    }
    let that = this;
    let p = new MyPromise((resolve,reject) => {
        if(that.status === fulFilled){
            setTimeout(_ => {
                onResolve(that.value)
            })
        }
        if(that.status === rejected){
            setTimeout(_ => {
                onRejected(that.value)
            })
        }
    })
    return p;
}


// æµ‹è¯•
try {
    let p = new MyPromise((resolve,reject) => {
        throw new TypeError('æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯')
    })
    console.log(p); 
} catch (error) {
    console.log(error);
}
// p.then();

try {
    let p1 = new Promise(resolve => {
        throw new TypeError('æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯')
    })
    console.log(p1);
} catch (error) {
    console.log(error);
}

Promiseå®ä¾‹è°ƒç”¨thenæ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœthenå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°é‡Œé¢æŠ›å‡ºäº†é”™è¯¯ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šè¢«rejectåæ‰

6.æ‰‹å†™Promiseçš„æ„ä¹‰

ç›¸å½“äºç…§ç€ä¸€ä¸ªè§„èŒƒç„¶åç”¨ä»£ç åŒºå®ç°ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºæ·±å…¥äº†è§£æºç ï¼Œåªæ˜¯Promiseæºç æ‰100å¤šè¡Œï¼Œç®—é˜…è¯»ä¸€ä¸ªå°å‹é¡¹ç›®çš„æºç æŠŠã€‚

const pending = 'pending';
const fulFilled = 'fulFilled';
const rejected = 'rejected';

// Promise/A+è§„èŒƒ

// 1. PromiseçŠ¶æ€

// ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ å½“Promiseä¸ºpendingçŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¢«è½¬æ¢æˆå¦å¤–ä¸¤ç§çŠ¶æ€
// ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰ å½“Promiseä¸ºfulFilledçŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œä¸èƒ½è¢«æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œä¸”å¿…é¡»æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸èƒ½è¢«æ›´æ”¹çš„valueå€¼
// ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰ å½“Promiseä¸ºrejectedçŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œä¸èƒ½è¢«æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œä¸”å¿…é¡»æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¸èƒ½è¢«æ›´æ”¹çš„reasonå€¼

function MyPromise(execute){
    const that = this;
    that.status = pending;
    that.resolveFn = [];
    that.rejectFn = [];
    function resolve(value){
        setTimeout(_ => {
            if(that.status === pending){
                that.status = fulFilled;
                that.value = value;
                that.resolveFn.forEach(f => {
                    f(that.value)
                })
            }
        })
    }

    function reject(reason){
        setTimeout(_ => {
            if(that.status === pending){
                that.status = rejected;
                that.value = reason;
                that.rejectFn.forEach(f => {
                    f(that.value)
                })
            }
        })
    }

    // å¦‚æœæ‰§è¡Œä¸­æœ‰é”™è¯¯ï¼Œä¼šç«‹é©¬æ‰§è¡Œreject
    // ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´Promiseä¸­çš„é”™è¯¯æ˜¯è¢«rejectåæ‰çš„
    // try...catchæ˜¯æ•è·ä¸åˆ°çš„
    try {
        execute(resolve,reject);   
    } catch (error) {
        reject(error)
    }
}

// 2.thenæ–¹æ³•

// é¦–å…ˆï¼Œthenæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æŒ‚åœ¨PromiseåŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•

// ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå›è°ƒå‡½æ•°,å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯å‡½æ•°å¿½ç•¥
// ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªPromise
// ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰thenæ–¹æ³•éœ€è¦å¼‚æ­¥æ‰§è¡Œ
// ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰thenå¯ä»¥è¢«é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰å¦‚æœonResolveæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨PromiseçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºfulFilledåè°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ6ï¼‰å¦‚æœonRejectedæ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨PromiseçŠ¶æ€ä¸ºrejectedåè°ƒç”¨
// ï¼ˆ7ï¼‰thenæ²¡æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„thisï¼ˆä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºthenæ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æŒ‚åœ¨PromiseåŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼‰
MyPromise.prototype.then = function(onResolve,onRejected){
    if(typeof onResolve !== 'function'){
        onResolve = value => value
    }
    if(typeof onRejected !== 'function'){
        onRejected = reason => {
            throw reason
        }
    }
    const that = this;
    let promise;
    if(that.status === fulFilled){
        promise = new MyPromise((resolve,reject) => {
            setTimeout(_ => {
                try {
                    let x = onResolve(that.value);
                    resolvePromise(promise,x,resolve,reject)
                } catch (error) {
                    reject(error)
                }
            })
        })
    }

    if(that.status === rejected){
        promise = new MyPromise((resolve,reject) => {
            setTimeout(_ => {
                try {
                    let x = onRejected(that.value);
                    resolvePromise(promise,x,resolve,reject)
                } catch (error) {
                    reject(error)
                }   
            })
        })
    }

    if(that.status === pending){
        promise = new MyPromise((resolve,reject) => {
            that.resolveFn.push(_ => {
                try {
                    let x = onResolve(that.value);
                    resolvePromise(promise,x,resolve,reject)
                } catch (error) {
                    reject(error)
                }
            })

            that.rejectFn.push(_ => {
                try {
                    let x = onRejected(that.value);
                    resolvePromise(promise,x,resolve,reject)
                } catch (error) {
                    reject(error)
                }   
            })
        })
    }
    return promise;
}

// 3.Promiseæ‰§è¡Œç¨‹åº

// 1.promiseå’ŒxæŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œreject()
// 2.xæ˜¯promiseï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨å®ƒçš„çŠ¶æ€
// 3.xæ˜¯å¯¹è±¡æˆ–å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¤„ç†
// 4.thenä¸æ˜¯å‡½æ•°
function resolvePromise(promise,x,resolve,reject){
    if(promise === x){
        return reject(new TypeError('promiseä¸èƒ½å’Œxç›¸ç­‰'))
    }
    if(x instanceof MyPromise){
        if(x.status === fulFilled){
            resolve(x.value)
        }else if(x.status === rejected){
            reject(x.value)
        }else{
            x.then(y => {
                resolvePromise(promise,y,resolve,reject)
            },reject)
        }
    }else if(x !== null && (typeof x === 'object' || typeof x === 'function')){
        let executed;
        try {
            let then = x.then;
            if(typeof then === 'function'){
                then.call(x,y => {
                    if(executed){
                        return false
                    }
                    executed = true;
                    resolvePromise(promise,y,resolve,reject)
                },e => {
                    if(executed){
                        return false
                    }
                    executed = true;
                    reject(e);
                })
            }else{
                resolve(x)
            }
        } catch (error) {
            if(executed){
                return false
            }
            executed = true;
            reject(error);
        }
    }else{
        resolve(x)
    }
}

ç”±äºæ“ä½œå‘ç”Ÿåœ¨å…¶ä»–åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨å¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œä¸»çº¿ç¨‹ä¸ä¼šè¢«é˜»å¡ã€‚

ç»å¸¸ç”¨åˆ°å¼‚æ­¥çš„ä¸šåŠ¡ï¼šä»ç½‘ç»œè·å–æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè®¿é—®æ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œä»ç½‘ç»œæ‘„åƒå¤´è·å¾—è§†é¢‘æµï¼Œæˆ–è€…å‘VRå¤´ç½©å¹¿æ’­å›¾åƒã€‚

2.å¼‚æ­¥ç¼–ç¨‹åœ¨JSä¸­çš„å®ç°

åœ¨JavaScriptä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œä½ ç»å¸¸ä¼šé‡åˆ°ä¸¤ç§å¼‚æ­¥ç¼–ç¨‹é£æ ¼ï¼šè€æ´¾callbacksï¼Œæ–°æ´¾promiseã€‚ä¸‹é¢å°±æ¥åˆ†åˆ«ä»‹ç»ã€‚

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰å¼‚æ­¥callbacks

å¼‚æ­¥callbacks å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡æ˜¯ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ç»™é‚£äº›åœ¨åå°æ‰§è¡Œçš„å…¶ä»–å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå½“é‚£äº›åå°è¿è¡Œçš„ä»£ç ç»“æŸï¼Œå°±è°ƒç”¨callbackså‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€šçŸ¥ä½ å·¥ä½œå·²ç»å®Œæˆã€‚

ä¹Ÿå­˜åœ¨åŒæ­¥çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚Array.prototype.forEach() ï¼š

const gods = ['Apollo', 'Artemis', 'Ares', 'Zeus'];

  <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
</head>

<body>
    <script>
        async function async1() {
            console.log('async1 start'); // 2
            await async2();
            //æ›´æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
            setTimeout(function () {
                console.log('setTimeout1') // 8 macro3
            }, 0)
        }
        async function async2() {
            //æ›´æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
            setTimeout(function () {
                console.log('setTimeout2') // 7 macro2
            }, 0)
        }
        console.log('script start'); // 1

        setTimeout(function () {
            console.log('setTimeout3'); // 6 macro1
        }, 0)
        async1();

        new Promise(function (resolve) {
            console.log('promise1'); // 3

        }).then(function () {
            console.log('promise2'); // 5 micro1

  <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
</head>

<body>
    <script>
        async function a1() {
            console.log('a1 start') // 2
            await a2()
            console.log('a1 end') // 7 micro2
        }
        async function a2() {
            console.log('a2') // 3
        }

        console.log('script start') // 1

        setTimeout(() => {
            console.log('setTimeout') // 10 macro1
        }, 0)

        Promise.resolve().then(() => {
            console.log('promise1') // 6 micro1 
        })

        a1()

        let promise2 = new Promise((resolve) => {
            resolve('promise2.then')
            console.log('promise2') // 4
        })

        promise2.then((res) => {
            console.log(res) // 8 micro3
            Promise.resolve().then(() => {
                console.log('promise3') // 9 micro4
            })
        })
        console.log('script end') // 5
    </script>
</body>

</html>
